lines: 1. Yesu, kar msalabani,Nitie soko maler,Aora machango tuo,Machwer a Kalwari.
Kalwari, Kalwari,E kar pakna pile,Nyaka chunya noyudi,Yueyo e par Nyasaye.
2. Kanyo e kar msalaba,Herani noyuda;An naluor, to In ing`won,Nimenya gi lerni.
3. Miya paro thoni, Ruoth,Kod rembi mochwerna;Konya bed buti pile,Ni mond` ichik wuodha.
4. Ruodha, mond asikiKanyo but msalaba,Kakiyo be kageno,Biro mari, Ruodha.
